Sentencas: Chemical looping gasification (CLG) can achieve the utilization of solid fuels for syngas production.
Titulo: Performance of solid oxide fuel cell with chemical looping gasification products as fuel

Sentencas: The CLG system integrated with solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is a promising energy conversion way.
Titulo: Performance of solid oxide fuel cell with chemical looping gasification products as fuel

Sentencas: In this work, an integration system of CLG and SOFC is evaluated via the implementation of a multi-field coupling modelling, where the products from the CLG are directly transported into the SOFC as the fuel and the coke deposition effect on the cell performance is evaluated.
Titulo: Performance of solid oxide fuel cell with chemical looping gasification products as fuel

Sentencas: The results reveal that SOFC temperature using pure hydrogen as fuel has an increase of around 4 K compared to that with gas mixture as fuel owing to the inhibition of carbon deposition.
Titulo: Performance of solid oxide fuel cell with chemical looping gasification products as fuel

Sentencas: It is found that the arrangement of anode and cathode in the countercurrent mode can promote the overall uniformity of current density compared to that in the cocurrent flow.
Titulo: Performance of solid oxide fuel cell with chemical looping gasification products as fuel

Sentencas: Moreover, the impact of operating parameter of the CLG system on the SOFC performance is also examined.
Titulo: Performance of solid oxide fuel cell with chemical looping gasification products as fuel

Sentencas: The results demonstrate that the increase of fuel reactor (FR) temperature and H2O/C molar ratio in the CLG system is beneficial to the inhibition of carbon deposition and the enhancement of the SOFC performance.
Titulo: Performance of solid oxide fuel cell with chemical looping gasification products as fuel
